notes: Game runs at smooth 60FPS at any resolution. The only issue currently is sound effects don't play. Music does and tracks for cutscene audio, but no jumping, shooting, etc sounds.
title: Mega Man 11 / ロックマン11 運命の歯車!!

notes:
Game runs fine with winetricks to fix audio issues.
WINEPREFIX=<steam library location>/compatdata/742300/pfx winetricks xact
title: Mega Man 11 / ロックマン11 運命の歯車!!

notes: See note below about xact and now it works perfectly. For me after running I still had to manually enable the DLLs, but it seems that's a case by case issue.
title: Mega Man 11 / ロックマン11 運命の歯車!!

gpu: X.Org AMD Radeon (TM) RX 480 Graphics (POLARIS10, DRM 3.26.0, 4.18.9-92.current, LLVM 6.0.1)
notes: Runs perfectly fine, some audio issues that can be fixed by adding xact. WINEPREFIX=<steam library location>/compatdata/742300/pfx winetricks xact
title: Mega Man 11 / ロックマン11 運命の歯車!!

notes: Install xact to the game prefix (...steamapps/compatdata/742300/pfx/) via winetricks to fix audio issues. Good performance and full xinput support.
title: Mega Man 11 / ロックマン11 運命の歯車!!
